QuestData.Title: Raising Spirits
QuestData.Description: The kegs are full of my worst stock. Good for burning, crap for drinking.$B$BI've broken out some tankards of my best spirits and had them carried out amongst the kegs though - those are for my well-deserving men! Spirits to raise their spirits after endless, grueling fighting.$B$BWould you be up for spreading the good cheer?
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw 8 Iron Belly Spirits to nearby Dusklight Skirmishers and Dusklight Rangers.
